sentence.Network_en: He had a rapacious appetite for bird's nest soup.
I have a recollection of large , unbending women with great noses and rapacious eyes.
sentence.Network_cn: 我记得我遇见不少身材壮硕、腰板挺得笔直的女人.这些女人生着大鼻子,目光炯炯.

sentence.Network_en: Those were not the consideration that drove this rapacious beast from his den into the open!
sentence.Network_cn: 把这只贪婪的野兽从窝里赶出来的并不是这些考虑!

rap v. 斥责；责难；敲击rapacious adj. 贪婪的；强夺的rapture n. 狂喜

list.abs: But Mr Stone is more interested in skewering rapacious financiers than rash homeowners ., 但是斯通先生更感兴趣的是去讥讽贪婪的金融家 , 而不是冲动的物业购买者.
贪 greedy贪食 rapacious appetite贪食而不运 rapacious appetite and non-movement of food.
allotment 小菜地rapacious market 掠夺性市场背景知识：西方国家由于强调环境保护，呼吁禁止燃烧fossil fuel,所以有的发电厂的周围就会种植.
the hunters drove this rapacious beast from his den into the open ., 猎人们将这只贪婪的野兽从窝里赶出来.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin rapax, rapac- (from rapere 'to snatch') + -ious

entry.tran: 贪婪的；贪得无厌的；自私的
entry.def: If you describe a person or their behaviour as rapacious, you disapprove of their greedy or selfish behaviour.

example.ex: He had a rapacious appetite for bird's nest soup.

means.word_mean: 1. living by preying on other animals especially by catching living prey;
3. devouring or craving food in great quantities;

stems_affixes.word_buile: rap捕,夺+acious多……的→夺的多的→强夺的

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表形容词,"有……特征的,多……的,易……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: auda大胆+acious有……特征的,多……的,易……的→adj.大胆的,愚勇的
sag知道+acious多……的→知道很多的→睿智的
ver真实+acious多……的→很多真实→可靠的
sequ跟随+acious多……的→跟随太多的→盲从的
ten拿住+acious多……的→拿住不放→固执的
rap夺+acious多……的→夺的多的→强夺的
viv生命+acious多……的→多生命的→活泼的
sal跳+acious有……特征的,多……的,易……的→见到女人就跳起来
